questions.question: What is Power BI?

options.A: A business analytics tool by Microsoft.

questions.explanation: Power BI is a business analytics tool by Microsoft that provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities.

questions.question: What is the primary function of Power BI?

options.A: To provide data visualization and business intelligence.

questions.explanation: The primary function of Power BI is to provide data visualization and business intelligence, enabling users to make informed decisions.

questions.question: What is Power BI Desktop?

options.A: A desktop application for designing reports and dashboards.
options.B: A mobile app for viewing reports.
options.C: A web-based platform for sharing reports.
options.D: A cloud service for storing data.

questions.explanation: Power BI Desktop is a desktop application for designing reports and dashboards, providing a comprehensive environment for data analysis.

questions.question: What is Power BI Service?

options.A: A cloud-based service for sharing and collaborating on reports.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Service is a cloud-based service for sharing and collaborating on reports, enabling users to access data insights from anywhere.

questions.question: What is Power BI Mobile?

options.A: A mobile app for viewing reports and dashboards.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A web-based platform for sharing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Mobile is a mobile app for viewing reports and dashboards, providing access to data insights on the go.

questions.question: What is Power BI Report Server?

options.A: An on-premises report server for hosting Power BI reports.
options.B: A cloud-based service for sharing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Report Server is an on-premises report server for hosting Power BI reports, providing a secure environment for data analysis.

questions.question: What is Power BI Gateway?

options.A: A tool for connecting on-premises data sources to Power BI.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.
options.D: A cloud-based service for sharing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Gateway is a tool for connecting on-premises data sources to Power BI, enabling seamless data integration.

questions.question: What is Power BI Embedded?

options.A: A service for embedding Power BI reports into applications.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Embedded is a service for embedding Power BI reports into applications, providing interactive data insights.

questions.question: What is Power BI Q&A?

options.A: A feature for asking questions about data in natural language.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Q&A is a feature for asking questions about data in natural language, providing quick insights into data.

questions.question: What is Power BI Visuals?

options.A: Custom visuals for enhancing data insights.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Visuals are custom visuals for enhancing data insights, providing unique ways to visualize data.

questions.question: What is Power BI Dataflows?

options.A: A tool for creating reusable data transformation logic.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Dataflows is a tool for creating reusable data transformation logic, enabling efficient data preparation.

questions.question: What is Power BI DAX?

options.A: A formula language for creating custom calculations.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI DAX is a formula language for creating custom calculations, providing advanced data analysis capabilities.

questions.question: What is Power BI RLS?

options.A: A feature for implementing row-level security.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI RLS is a feature for implementing row-level security, ensuring data privacy and security.

questions.question: What is Power BI AI Insights?

options.A: A feature for applying AI models to data.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI AI Insights is a feature for applying AI models to data, providing advanced data analysis capabilities.

questions.question: What is Power BI Paginated Reports?

options.A: A feature for creating pixel-perfect reports.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Paginated Reports is a feature for creating pixel-perfect reports, providing detailed data insights.

questions.question: What is Power BI Data Alerts?

options.A: A feature for setting alerts on data changes.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Data Alerts is a feature for setting alerts on data changes, providing timely notifications.

questions.question: What is Power BI Quick Insights?

options.A: A feature for generating automated insights from data.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Quick Insights is a feature for generating automated insights from data, providing quick data analysis.

questions.question: What is Power BI Content Packs?

options.A: Pre-packaged content for specific data sources.
options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Content Packs are pre-packaged content for specific data sources, providing ready-to-use data insights.

questions.question: What is Power BI Workspaces?

options.B: A desktop application for designing reports.
options.C: A mobile app for viewing reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI Workspaces are collaborative environments for sharing reports, enabling team collaboration.
